Class IPv6Address

java.lang.Object
  com.craftfire.commons.ip.IPAddress
      com.craftfire.commons.ip.IPv6Address

public class IPv6Address
extends IPAddress

A class that represents an IPv6 address.

IPv6Address

public IPv6Address(byte[] bytes)
Creates an IPv4Address object form given byte representation.

Parameters:
bytes - byte representation of the IPv6 address, must be 16 byte long
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the number of bytes is different than 16

IPv6Address

public IPv6Address(short... address)
Creates an IPv4Address object from four integers corresponding to four parts of IPv6 address (usually separated by colons).

Parameters:
address - short integer parts of the IPv6 address, must be exactly 8 elements
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the number of shorts is different than 8

IPv6Address

public IPv6Address(int... address)
Creates an IPv4Address object from four integers corresponding to four parts of IPv6 address (usually separated by colons).

Parameters:
address - integer parts of the IPv6 address, must be exactly 8 elements
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the number of ints is different than 8
